content: Quitobaquito Springs, within Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument in Arizona, the only naturally occurring source of fresh water for miles. Nearby, contractors at the border with Mexico are drilling into the ground and draining water from a nearby, rare desert aquifer in order to mix concrete to support a towering 30-foot barrier along the U.S/Mexico divide. (Feb. 2020)__no.0439, 2020.  #borderwall #aquifers
